snippet: The Fiesta Bowl’s former chief operating officer pleaded guilty in Phoenix to a felony federal conspiracy charge for her role in a fraudulent campaign-contribution scheme.
lead_paragraph: The Fiesta Bowl’s former chief operating officer pleaded guilty in Phoenix to a felony federal conspiracy charge for her role in a fraudulent campaign-contribution scheme.

headline.seo: Ex-Fiesta Bowl Official Pleads Guilty to Felony
headline.main: Ex-Fiesta Bowl Official Pleads Guilty to Felony
headline.print_headline: Ex-Fiesta Bowl Official Pleads Guilty to Felony
